content: @Michael Lawley @Jim Steel Is there a version of snapper for DSTU2 somewhere?
https://ontoserver.csiro.au/snapper2-dev - remember it is beta; a work in progress

Snapper Terms of Use say: You MUST be based in Australia
Any idea how this will evolve in the future?

@Marc de Graauw we're working on that one. We're more than happy for anyone (regardless of location) to have a play with it, but for any real use, it's currently only available to people based in Australia (funded by the Australian Digital Health Agency). We're open to licensing arangements for others, possibly even an Open Source arrangement as long as we can establish a sustainable support model.
